00037 int used_memory() {
00038 #ifdef WIN32
00039   return 42;
00040 #else
00041   FILE *f;
00042   int mem;
00043   char fn[512];
00044   sprintf(fn, "/proc/%d/statm", getpid());
00045   f = fopen(fn, "r");
00046   fscanf(f, "%d", &mem);
00047   fclose(f);
00048   return (mem*4)/1024;
00049 #endif
00050 }

00059 image_classification_tree::image_classification_tree(int _image_width, int _image_height, 
00060                                                      int _class_number, int _max_depth,

00062                                                      : image_classifier(_image_width, _image_height, _class_number,_LearnProgress)

00069 bool image_classification_tree::load(string filename)
00070 {
00071   string dummyString;
00072 
00073   try {
00074     ifstream ifs(filename.data());
00075 
00076     ifs >> dummyString >> image_width >> image_height;
00077     global_patch_size = image_width;
00078     cout << "[Patch size: " << global_patch_size << "]" << flush;
00079 
00080     ifs >> dummyString >> class_number;
00081     ifs >> dummyString >> max_depth;
00082 
00083     // Read nodes in an iterative way (faster than in a recursive way):
00084     int nodes_plus_leaves_number;
00085     ifs >> nodes_plus_leaves_number;
00086 
00087     image_classification_node ** nodes = new image_classification_node* [nodes_plus_leaves_number];
00088 
00089     try
00090     {
00091       for(int i = 0; i < nodes_plus_leaves_number; i++)
00092       {
00093         image_classification_node * tmp_node = new image_classification_node();
00094         ifs >> *tmp_node;
00095         nodes[tmp_node->index] = tmp_node;
00096       }
00097     }
00098     catch (exception)
00099     {
00100       delete [] nodes;
00101       return false;
00102     }
00103 
00104     // Rebuild the tree:
00105     root = nodes[0];
00106     for(int i = 0; i < nodes_plus_leaves_number; i++)
00107     {
00108       image_classification_node * node = nodes[i];
00109 
00110       if ( !node->is_leaf() )
00111       {
00112         assert(node->children_number <= 3);
00113 
00114         for(int i = 0; i < node->children_number; i++)
00115         {
00116           node->children[i] = nodes[node->children_index[i]];
00117           node->children[i]->parent = node;
00118         }
00119         delete [] node->children_index;
00120       }
00121     }
00122 
00123     delete [] nodes;
00124 
00125   }
00126   catch (exception)
00127   {
00128     return false;
00129   }
00130 
00131   cout << ". Ok." << endl;
00132 
00133   return true;
00134 }
00135 
00136 image_classification_tree::~image_classification_tree()
00137 {
00138   if (root != 0)
00139     delete root;
00140 }

00142 bool image_classification_tree::save(string filename)
00143 {
00144   cout << "Saving tree (" << filename << ")..." << flush;
00145 
00146   ofstream ofs(filename.data());
00147 
00148   ofs << "image_size: " << image_width << " " << image_height << endl;
00149   ofs << "class_number: " << class_number << endl;
00150   ofs << "max_depth:  " << max_depth << endl;
00151 
00152   ofs << node_number() + leaves_number() << endl;
00153 
00154   ofs << *root;
00155 
00156   ofs.close();
00157 
00158   cout << "...ok." << endl;
00159 
00160   return true;
00161 }

00163 void image_classification_tree::refine(example_generator * vg, int call_number)
00164 {
00165   for(int i = 0; i < call_number; i++)
00166   {
00167     cout << "REFINEMENT: " << call_number - i << "...    \r" << flush;
00168 
00169     vector<image_class_example *> * examples = vg->generate_random_examples();
00170 
00171     for(vector<image_class_example *>::iterator it = examples->begin(); it < examples->end(); it++)
00172     {
00173       image_classification_node * node = root;
00174 
00175       while(!node->is_leaf()) 
00176         node = node->children[node->child_index(*it)];
00177       
00178       node->P[(*it)->class_index]++;
00179     }
00180 
00181     delete examples;
00182 
00183     vg->release_examples();
00184   }
00185 
00186   root->reestimate_probabilities_recursive();
00187 
00188   cout << "Refinement done (" << call_number << " calls to generate_random_examples).            " << endl;
00189 }
00190 
00191 void image_classification_tree::test(example_generator * vg, int call_number)
00192 {
00193   int * inlier_total = new int[class_number];
00194   int * total = new int[class_number];
00195 
00196   for(int i = 0; i < class_number; i++)
00197     inlier_total[i] = total[i] = 0;
00198 
00199   for(int i = 0; i < call_number; i++)
00200   {
00201     cout << "GENERATING TESTING SET: " << call_number - i << "...    " << (char)13 << flush;
00202 
00203     vector<image_class_example *> * examples = vg->generate_random_examples();
00204 
00205     for(vector<image_class_example *>::iterator it = examples->begin(); it < examples->end(); it++)
00206     {
00207       int found_class_index = recognize(*it, 0);
00208 
00209       total[(*it)->class_index]++;
00210       if ((*it)->class_index == found_class_index)
00211         inlier_total[found_class_index]++;
00212     }
00213 
00214     delete examples;
00215 
00216     vg->release_examples();
00217   }
00218 
00219   cout << "Test: " << flush;
00220   for(int i = 0; i < class_number; i++)
00221   {
00222     cout << "[class " << i << ": ";
00223     if (total[i] == 0)
00224       cout << "not represented !!!]." << flush;
00225     else
00226       cout << std::setprecision(1) << 100. * float(inlier_total[i]) / total[i] << "% inliers]." << flush;
00227   }
00228   
00229   int T = 0, IT = 0;
00230   for(int i = 0; i < class_number; i++)
00231   {
00232     T += total[i];
00233     IT += inlier_total[i];
00234   }
00235 
00236   cout << "ok) -> " << setprecision(1) << 100. * float(IT) / T << "% inliers." << endl;
00237 }

00239 
00240 int image_classification_tree::recognize(image_class_example * image, float * confidence, int /*dummy*/)
00241 {
00242   image_classification_node * node = root;
00243 
00244   while(!node->is_leaf()) 
00245     node = node->children[node->child_index(image)];
00246 
00247   if (confidence != 0)
00248     *confidence = node->P[node->best_class];
00249 
00250   return node->best_class;
00251 }
00252 
00253 float * image_classification_tree::posterior_probabilities(image_class_example * pv, int /*dummy*/)
00254 {
00255   image_classification_node * node = root;
00256   unsigned char * I = (unsigned char *)(pv->preprocessed->imageData);
00257 
00258   while(!node->is_leaf())
00259   {
00260     int dot_product = (int)I[node->d1] - (int)I[node->d2];
00261 
00262     if (dot_product <= 0) 
00263       node = node->children[0];
00264     else 
00265       node = node->children[1];
00266   }
00267   return node->P;
00268 }

00290 image_classification_node * image_classification_tree::extract_node(vector <image_classification_node*> * L)
00291 {
00292   image_classification_node * result = (image_classification_node *)L->back();
00293   L->pop_back();
00294 
00295   return result;
00296 }

00300   root->change_class_number_and_reset_probabilities(new_class_number);
